text: ==D04A Antipruritics, including antihistamines, anesthetics, etc.== ===D04AA Antihistamines for topical use=== :D04AA01 Thonzylamine :D04AA02 Mepyramine :D04AA03 Thenalidine :D04AA04 Tripelennamine :D04AA09 Chloropyramine :D04AA10 Promethazine :D04AA12 Tolpropamine :D04AA13 Dimetindene :D04AA14 Clemastine :D04AA15 Bamipine :D04AA16 Pheniramine :D04AA22 Isothipendyl :D04AA32 Diphenhydramine :D04AA33 Diphenhydramine methylbromide :D04AA34 Chlorphenoxamine ===D04AB Anesthetics for topical use=== :D04AB01 Lidocaine :D04AB02 Cinchocaine :D04AB03 Oxybuprocaine :D04AB04 Benzocaine :D04AB05 Quinisocaine :D04AB06 Tetracaine :D04AB07 Pramocaine :QD04AB51 Lidocaine, combinations ===D04AX Other antipruritics=== :D04AX01 Doxepin ==References== D04
title: ATC code D04
